Secondly, I think you might enjoy "The Bad Seed" (1954), which has a subtle but fascinating connection to vampirism. The movie follows an unsettling young girl who seems sweet on the surface but harbors dark secrets - not unlike some of the mysterious characters we find in vampire stories.
